entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow changing to periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
